pageNotFoundSubtitle: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for. Perhaps you’ve mistyped the URL? Be sure to check your spelling.
unauthorizedPageTitle: Unauthorised, Access denied due to invalid credentials
unauthorizedPageSubTitle: Your authorisation failed, Please try again.
serverErrorPageSubTitle: The server encountered an internal error or misconfiguration and was unable to complete your request.
resetPasswordPageSubTitle: Enter your email below for the reset link.
successDialogContent: You have signed up successfully, we have a sent you a mail with the verification link.
invalidDialogContent: The password you entered seems to be incorrect, please try again.
resetDialogContent: The reset link to reset your password has been sent to your email, use the link to reset your password.
changePasswordSubTitle: Enter your old and new passwords in the fields below to change the password.
successPasswordDialogContent: The password has been changed successfully, please sign in back to continue.
passwordShort: Password is too short - should be 8 chars minimum
emailAlreadyInUse: This email Is already in use
sameAsOldPassword: Please enter a password different from the existing one
